brand_identity.name: Silwer Lining Photography
brand_identity.target_audience: Expecting mothers, new parents, families, high-end clients
brand_identity.design_philosophy: Minimalist elegance with warm, earthy undertones. Focus on negative space and high-quality imagery.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and package names. Use italic variants for emphasis.

body.usage: Paragraphs, navigation, buttons, and pricing details.

accents.usage: Testimonials, quotes, and subtle decorative text.

usage_rules.background: Use #FDFCF8 for the main background. Avoid pure white (#FFFFFF) except for image borders or specific cards.
usage_rules.text: Use #2D2A26 for primary text. Never use pure black (#000000).
usage_rules.primary: Use #C6A87C for CTAs, active states, and key highlights. Use sparingly to maintain luxury feel.
usage_rules.gradients: Do not use gradients. Rely on solid, warm tones and texture.

grid_system.portfolio: Masonry or Asymmetrical Grid. Avoid uniform squares. Mix portrait (aspect-ratio 3/4) and landscape (aspect-ratio 4/3) images.
grid_system.pricing: 3-column grid for packages. Center the 'Most Popular' option and scale it slightly larger.
grid_system.bento: Use for 'Services' or 'About' highlights. Mix text blocks with image blocks.

variants.default: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all duration-300 shadow-md hover:shadow-lg
variants.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white transition-all duration-300

cards.style: Minimalist. White or very light beige background. Soft shadow (shadow-sm).

inputs.style: Flat, minimal borders. Background transparent or #FFFFFF.

navigation.links: Uppercase, tracking-widest, text-sm. Hover: text-primary underline-offset-4.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for overlays, sticky headers, and toast notifications. Class: bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/20.
visual_enhancers.textures: Optional: Subtle grain overlay on the background to add warmth and tactility.

media.image_style: High quality, warm toning. No harsh filters. Use 'object-cover' for all containers.
media.border_radius: rounded-lg for standard images. rounded-none for full-width hero sections.

hero.alt: Family walking in warm sunset light

maternity.alt: Artistic maternity portrait in warm light

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA standards. Use darker shades of the primary color for text if needed.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.
accessibility.alt_text: All images must have descriptive alt text.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts or Fontsource.
2. Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom color palette and font families.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that wraps pages with the sticky header and footer.
4. Use 'framer-motion' for subtle entrance animations (fade-in, slide-up) on scroll.
5. Build the Booking System using a custom calendar component (based on Shadcn Calendar) that allows date/time selection.
6. Ensure the 'Portfolio' page uses a filterable masonry grid.
7. The 'Admin Dashboard' should be clean and functional, using a sidebar layout.
8. Use 'lucide-react' for icons (thin stroke width to match elegance).
9. Implement the 'Contact' form using Shadcn Form components with Zod validation.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
